name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OSPF | Neighbor Up (SYSLOG)
description: %OSPF-5-ADJCHG: Process 1, Nbr 10.10.20.30 on Vlan444 from LOADING to FULL, Loading Done

patterns.value_re: %OSPF-5-ADJCHG: Process \d+, Nbr (?P<neighbor>\S+)\s*on (?P<interface>.+) from (?P<from_state>LOADING) to (?P<to_state>FULL), Loading Done$

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OSPF | Neighbor Down (SYSLOG)
description: %OSPF-5-ADJCHG: Process 1, Nbr 10.10.20.28 on Vlan444 from INIT to DOWN, Neighbor Down: Dead timer expired

patterns.value_re: %OSPF-5-ADJCHG: Process \d+, Nbr (?P<neighbor>\S+)\s*on (?P<interface>.+) from (?P<from_state>INIT|FULL|2WAY) to (?P<to_state>DOWN), Neighbor Down: (?P<reason>.+)
